response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and given its worth to others, I'm confident it will serve you well too. Considering its quality and benefits, I'm extending an offer to sell it to you for $95. This price reflects its value while allowing me to ensure a fair return on my investment. I hope you'll find this proposal appealing and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 95}
